## TranslationErrorDetails.itemNewTargetTitle property

Title the Item as it is retrieved by from the translation management system, or `undefined` if the error is not associated with a specific target Item.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get itemNewTargetTitle(): string | undefined;
```
